#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int T,N,P;
    string s;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&N);
        cin>>s;
        scanf("%d",&P);
          if(s[0]=='o')
            printf("%d\n",(2+(P-1)*2));

          else
            printf("%d\n",(1+(P-1)*2));

    }
}
